Source.Name: i8kutils
Source.Summary: This package contains user-space programs for controling the fans on Dell laptops
Source.Description: This package contains a kernel driver and user-space programs for accessing the SMM BIOS of some Dell laptops. The SMM BIOS is used on many recent laptops to implement APM functionalities and to access custom hardware, for example the cooling fans and volume buttons.
